item.title: whoami
item.description: My name is Konstantinos Livieratos, just Kostas for short. Curious about everything by nature, software engineer by day and night. The most important things that sum myself up: Backend engineer at Detectify, at the Core Services Team Co-founder of Madinad, a premium advertising network. Currently advising Obsessed with Scandinavian design I speak mainly Python and Go Live in magnificent Stockholm, Sweden Huge believer of DevOps discipline My hands are dirty all day long with Kubernetes, containers and many similar things in between Certified AWS Solutions Architect, toying around with DigitalOcean too Sometimes I cook What else do you need?
